text: Mexico national football team is the national football team of Mexico. ==Player records== ===Most capped players=== Players in bold text are still active with Mexico. As of 19 June 2019.Appearances for Mexico National Team. Rec.Sport.Soccer Statistics Foundation # Player Period Caps 1 Andrés Guardado 2005– 179 2 Claudio Suárez 1992–2006 177 3 Pável Pardo 1996–2009 146 Gerardo Torrado 1999–2013 Rafael Márquez 1997–2018 6 Jorge Campos 1991–2004 130 7 Carlos Salcido 2004–2014 124 8 Ramón Ramírez 1991–2000 121 9 Cuauhtémoc Blanco 1995–2014 120 10 Alberto García-Aspe 1988–2002 109 ===Top goalscorers=== Players in bold text are still active with Mexico. As of 27 March 2019.Goalscoring for Mexico National Team. title: Mexico national football team
